# SERP Keyword Ranking Dashboard - Project Setup

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements  
- [x] Scaffold the Project  
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Type: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript
## Features: Keyword ranking tracking, SERP monitoring, charts, GitHub Actions, Vercel deployment

## Setup Complete!

The project has been successfully created with all components:
- ✅ Next.js 16 with App Router
- ✅ TypeScript configuration
- ✅ Tailwind CSS for styling
- ✅ Recharts for data visualization
- ✅ Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL
- ✅ API routes for keyword management and SERP data
- ✅ GitHub Actions for automated daily rank checking
- ✅ Vercel deployment configuration
- ✅ Comprehensive documentation

Next steps:
1. Set up PostgreSQL database
2. Copy .env.example to .env and add your credentials
3. Run `npx prisma db push` to create database tables
4. Run `npm run dev` to start development server
5. Deploy to Vercel and configure environment variables
6. Add GitHub secrets for automated rank checking
